original_text: He removed the altars on the hills. He also removed the altars in all Judah's cities where people burned incense. There was peace in his kingdom while he ruled.
korean_text: 또 유다 모든 성읍에서 산당과 태양상을 없애매 나라가 그 앞에서 평안함을 누리니라

sentences.original_text: He removed the altars on the hills
He also removed the altars in all Judah's cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 유다의 모든 성읍에 있는 제단들을 제거했습니다

sentences.original_text: There was peace in his kingdom
